Encoders Notes
Well i think there where 3 different videos in the source.
1 Main video
1 for the ending
1 to fill in the missing bits.
I split the source into 2 pieces,
The main video & 15 minutes of the end.
With the 1st part i, lowered the brightness
increased the contrast, saturation & gamma.
De-noised it, Sharpened it & changed the colors with a RGB EQ.
With the second part i,
de-noised it, lowered the brightness & contrast,
Changed the colors with a rgb eq.
After encoding, i stuck the two parts back together & muxed them to the line audio.
Its not great but its ok considering the film only hit the cinemas on 11th.
Its a bit blurry & over cropped.
It is watchable but download the sample first,
Just to check that your happy with the quality.
Enjoy...
